about_the_game:
Welcome to an immersive horror experience where the familiar becomes unsettling, and the mundane turns into a waking nightmare. Explore an abandoned liminal space trapped in the eerie twilight of darkness, where reality blurs and the past refuses to let go.

Game Overview:

In Backrooms you take on the role of a lone explorer drawn to a forgotten neighborhood by cryptic messages and haunting visions. As you delve deeper into the desolate streets, you’ll uncover the dark secrets that led to its abandonment. Every corner and hallway holds pieces of the puzzle, but be warned: you are not alone. Shadows move in the periphery of your vision, and echoes of the past resonate through the empty halls.

Key Features:

Eerie Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a meticulously crafted environment where the ordinary becomes sinister. The game's ambient soundscape and chilling visuals create a palpable sense of dread.
Exploration-Based Horror: Navigate through an open-world liminal space. Each corner hides its own story, revealed through environmental storytelling and hidden clues.
Unravel the Mystery: Piece together the history of the suburb through journals, photographs, and artifacts. Uncover the truth behind the mass disappearance of its residents and the malevolent force that lingers.
Dynamic Encounters: Encounter unpredictable, supernatural entities that stalk the shadows. Use your wits to evade them, as direct confrontation is rarely an option.
Psychological Horror Elements: Experience a narrative that plays with your mind, challenging your perception of reality and making you question what is real and what is imagined.

Survive the Shadows!

Your journey will test your courage and resolve. Will you uncover the truth behind the abandoned suburb, or will you become another lost soul wandering its streets? Backrooms invites you to face your fears and explore the thin line between reality and the supernatural.

Dare to enter the shadows?

Dare to enter the shadows?
name: Backrooms Liminality

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Explore an abandoned liminal space. Uncover dark secrets through eerie exploration and environmental storytelling. Evade unpredictable supernatural entities and face psychological horror. Will you reveal the truth or become another lost soul?
